definitions: a member of a modern religious movement that seeks to incorporate beliefs or ritual practices from traditions outside the main world religions, especially those of pre-Christian Europe and North America

examples.text: religious neopagans are not too far distant from a conventional religion

shortDefinitions: member of modern religious movement incorporating beliefs from traditions outside main world religions
